text: Johannes Nicolaas “John” Leddy (13 January 1930 — 25 December 2022) was a Dutch television and movie actor. He was most known for his roles as Jan Engelmoer in the television series De kleine waarheid and as Koos Dobbelsteen in Zeg 'ns Aaa. Leddy died on 25 December 2022 in the Jeroen Bosch Hospital at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch television actors Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Actors from The Hague
title: John Leddy
